title: What’s in Our Queue? ‘Lingua Franca’ and More
title_page: What’s in Our Queue? ‘Lingua Franca’ and More - The New York Times
maintext:
What’s in Our Queue? ‘Lingua Franca’ and More
Isabel Sandoval in “Lingua Franca.” Array
I’m an editor on the Culture desk focused on audience engagement. I’ve spent the past year connecting more with nature and introducing my son to pop-punk (it’s never too early).
Here are five other things I’ve been enjoying lately →
